entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
